hero.title: Welcome to BaseCore
hero.subtitle: New era in crypto
hero.mission: The main mission of the project is to make BaseCore accessible to everyone and lower the entry threshold for all investors.

advantage.title: Advantage
advantage.description: BaseCore leverages advanced cryptographic protocols and decentralized consensus mechanisms to ensure tamper-proof transactions and data integrity. Immune to single points of failure, making it highly resistant to hacks and fraud.

scalability.title: Scalability Without Compromise
scalability.description: Built to handle high transaction volumes with low latency, BaseCore ensures seamless performance even during peak demand.
scalability.subdescription: Utilizes innovative layer-2 solutions or sharding to maintain speed and efficiency as the network grows.

userFriendly.title: User-Friendly
userFriendly.description: BaseCore simplifies blockchain adoption with intuitive interfaces, developer-friendly tools, and seamless integration for businesses and end-users. Reduces the complexity of blockchain technology, making it accessible to everyone.

ecoFriendly.title: Eco-Friendly
ecoFriendly.description: BaseCore employs a sustainable consensus mechanism (e.g., Proof-of-Stake or hybrid models) to minimize energy consumption while maintaining network security. Ideal for eco-conscious projects and enterprises.

options.title: Why is our blockchain the best option for you?

first.title: Low Transaction Costs
first.description: By optimizing network resources, BaseCore offers ultra-low transaction fees, making it cost-effective for microtransactions and large-scale operations alike.

second.title: Privacy Features
second.description: BaseCore integrates optional privacy protocols, allowing users to conduct confidential transactions when needed. Balances transparency with privacy for diverse use cases.

rewards.title: Blockchain BaseCore assumes rewards for block validation to two participants in the network

info.title: Stakers and masternodes receive rewards for block validation

firstBlock.description: Is generated every minute, with 0.005 BCE allocated to stakers

secondBlock.description: Division with 0.495 BCE allocated to masternodes

passive.title: The 3 ways of making passive income with BaseCore

invest.mainTitle: The most affordable way with an entry threshold of just 0.001 BCE is
invest.highlight: to invest in an instant masternode
invest.subtitle: , which partakes in network block validation.

features.daily: Rewards for generating new blocks are accrued daily
features.proportion: Rewards grow in proportion to the number of BCE coins invested
features.calculation: Rewards are calculated based on the number of coins invested in the masternode
features.more: The more you invest in BCE – the more rewards you will receive

points.second: Generating new blocks in the blockchain
points.third: Will receive a reward for generating new blocks in the blockchain

points.first: The reward is calculated depending on the number of coins invested in the masternode.
points.second: The more you invest in BCE, the more rewards you will receive

join.title: How to join an instant masternode?
join.subtitle: The easiest way is to join through a pool on the BCE2um.com exchange.

whyInvest.title: Why invest in BaseCore?
whyInvest.partnerships: Partnerships: Strategic partnerships with businesses, governments, and other blockchain projects can enhance BaseCore's utility and value.

security.title: The security of BCE
security.tokenPrice: The price of token is always equal to the price of BCE
security.realTimeAccess: Investors have real-time access to the application and dynamics of their coins
security.sellOptions: Investors can sell their coins on exchanges or via P2P network

devices.title: You can pay and transfer coins through wallets on any device

goals.title: Goals
goals.description: We plan to create an ecosystem of services that will allow integrating BaseCore into people's everyday lives

first.text: We are planning to create an ecosystem of services that will allow the integration of BaseCore into everyday life

second.text: We are planning to create an ecosystem of services that will allow the integration of BaseCore into everyday life

third.text: Payment facilities will be integrated in popular store transaction processing systems like Bitrix, Joomla, WordPress, Tilda, Shopify and others

features.staking: Allows users to stake their BaseCore tokens directly from the wallet to earn passive income.
features.swaps: Supports token swaps, liquidity provision, and yield farming.
features.phonePayment: Shake your phone near the seller's phone to pay
features.support: While primarily designed for BaseCore tokens, the wallet may also support other cryptocurrencies and tokens within the ecosystem.

development.title: Development is planned for the period of june 2025

security.title: We have implemented the most advanced investor account protection

monitoring.title: Unique monitoring system
monitoring.description: We have deployed a unique monitoring system to detect suspicious activity from unauthorized actions in 24/7 mode

twoFactor.title: Two-factor Authentication (2FA)
twoFactor.description: Two-factor Authentication (2FA) protects investors' personal accounts from unauthorized access

ddos.title: DDoS protection
ddos.description: DDoS protection is a standard component of the system

servers.title: Protected from attacks
servers.description: The servers of the exchange and wallets are protected from attacks

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: Sorry, but the page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.
